name: All content meets Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) Overview - Level A, AA, or AAA
All content meets relevant good practice in How to Make Your Presentations Accessible to All
Audio and video content meets the good practice in Audio Content and Video Content
Description of visual information - integrated description, audio description, or text description
Captions (also called intralingual subtitles), live captions (also called real-time or CART)
Transcripts - basic transcripts, descriptive transcripts, interactive transcripts
Sign language interpretation - International Sign, or other language
Teaching resources available in relevant alternative formats (e.g., large print documents, tactile graphics, braille translations and printing, etc.)
